articles.author: Sean O'Kane
articles.title: Regulators probe Waymo after its robotaxi drove around a stopped school bus - TechCrunch
articles.description: The incident happened in Atlanta, Georgia, earlier this month. Waymo says it has already updated the software on its robotaxis.
articles.content:
A Waymo robotaxi was recently spotted driving around a school bus that had its red lights flashing, and federal safety regulators have opened an investigation as a result.
